ygData.subject: Re: Problems setting up hyperNEAT 2.6
ygData.msgSnippet: That means it isn t finding your boost libraries. Make sure the BOOST_STAGE cmake variable contains the path which has all of your boost lib files.

That means it isn't finding your boost libraries.

Make sure the BOOST_STAG=
E cmake variable contains the path which has all of your boost lib files.

=
